abstract: The hottest rumors revolving around the upcoming Macworld convention are about the new products that could be introduced: an Apple cellphone/iPod, a touchscreen iPod and a Macintosh tablet.
snippet: The hottest rumors revolving around the upcoming Macworld convention are about the new products that could be introduced: an Apple cellphone/iPod, a touchscreen iPod and a Macintosh tablet.
lead_paragraph: Next week, I’ll be in San Francisco to cover the Macworld Expo. It’s nominally a show about Apple products, but as everyone knows, what Apple does is usually adopted shortly thereafter by the rest of the industry (think CD-ROM, Wi-Fi, music player/online music store). So it’s a big deal, and loads of fun.
